product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Sac Set
long_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Sac Set includes 3 different size packing sacs for organizing your toiletries, receipts or any other small items in your backpack or suitcase. Ultra lightweight ripstop silnylon allows for visibility of contents; plus, it's water- and stain-resistant. Zippered closures and clip-on attachment featured on each Pack-It Specter sac.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Sac Set includes 3 different size packing sacs for organizing your toiletries, receipts or any other small items in your backpack or suitcase.
